about-me.p1: I’m a self-taught full stack developer based in Dhupguri, India. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences
about-me.p2: Transforming my thoughts and knowledge into websites has been my passion for over a year. And I always believe in quality rather than quantity. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks
about-me.p3: Other than web development, I really am intrigued about the operations part of app lifecycle. In modern terms, DevOps is my goal and web dev is part of it.

intro-description: Welcome to my tech portfolio, here I showcase my skills, experiences, and projects in the field of technology. I am a dedicated full stack developer and a DevOps Enthusiast, with a passion for developing innovative solutions and solving complex problems.

quote.author: Albert Einstein
quote.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.

footer-description: I am a dedicated full stack developer and a DevOps Enthusiast, with a passion for developing innovative solutions solving complex problems. Full Stack with JavaScript and DevOps with Go, is my life in this vast tech industry.
funfacts: I like winter more than summer
I often motorbike with my friends
My current favourite show is The Witcher
I intend to give the world new view from my camera lenses

projects.title: Yatra Sahayak
projects.description: Check room availability in desired dates, make reservation and get your reservation summary in Email. Technically a Golang based Web Application with Database Interaction

projects.title: Blogosphere
projects.description: Contains Javascript code of a blogging website using ReactJS, MongoDB, Express and Node

projects.title: Food Truck
projects.description: Contains a frontend only React project, I built it for a Internship assignment.

projects.title: Portfolio V1
projects.description: This repo contains my own portfolio website made using Flutter, Firebase, and Github.

projects.title: Gaze Weather
projects.description: Contains a weather interface with main stream informations about your location.

projects.title: Text Lead Tracker
projects.description: Contains raw HTML, CSS and JS code of a Chrome Extension to save quickies.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.description: This is a simple URL shortener service that uses Redis as a database. It is built using Golang and Docker. It is also deployed on somewhere.

projects.title: Backstage Talks
projects.description: Contains a clone of Backstage Magazines Collections overview. It is made using Typescript, React and Firebase.
